channel.title: Vaccines on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Vaccines on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Vaccines and Autism
item.description: Do vaccines cause autism? In a study published in 2009, Jeffrey Gerber and Paul Offit try to determine if the components in a vaccine result in increased rates of autism. They conclude the research by assessing a variety of hypothesizes individually. Stick around to see if the vaccinations impact social skills, neurological behavior, and communication. This study, published on February 15 of 2009 by Jeffrey S. Gerber and Paul A.
